title: Stonecutting course in France?
content:
Hello,  
I would like to attempt a course of stonecutting this year (evening or week-end course, because I'm a fulltime worker), but don't know any in France. Would anyone of you know a good adress or tip for me?  
Thanks in advance,  
Claire
author: claire

comments.content:
A similar question came up some time ago. I don't know what  
happend at least cause the thread --\> [http://typophile.com/node/9822](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042830/http:/typophile.com/node/9822 "http://typophile.com/node/9822")  
ended soon, but maybe docunagi could tell us?  
I'd be very interested in such a course, too.

fj
I believe that there are several courses available in England and Wales.

I give private tuition in letter carving, alphabet design, and calligraphy in Wales.  
I am attaching below my email address and web site link if anybody is interested.

[rees.ieuan@gmail.com](mailto:rees.ieuan@gmail.com).

[www.ieuanreeslettering.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042830/http:/www.ieuanreeslettering.co.uk/ "www.ieuanreeslettering.co.uk")

Ieuan Rees
